summary: This is a U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) TECS Person Encounter List detailing Jeffrey Epstein's private jet flights in June 2019, shortly before his arrest. It shows three flights between Teterboro, NJ (KTEB) and locations coded TIST and LFPB, with one flight originating from an INS (Immigration and Naturalization Service) location.

persons.name: Jeffrey P Epstein
persons.context: Listed as a passenger on three private jet flights (N212JE) in June 2019, as recorded by U.S. Customs and Border Protection.

events.title: Epstein Flight from Teterboro
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein traveled as a passenger on private jet N212JE from Teterboro, NJ (KTEB) to TIST.

events.title: Epstein Flight from INS Location
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein traveled as a passenger on private jet N212JE from an INS (Immigration and Naturalization Service) location to Teterboro, NJ (KTEB).

events.title: Epstein Flight to LFPB
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein traveled as a passenger on private jet N212JE from Teterboro, NJ (KTEB) to LFPB.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was actively traveling on his private jet (N212JE) in June 2019, just weeks before his arrest on July 6, 2019.
The document records three specific flights on June 10, 11, and 14, 2019, tracked by U.S. Customs and Border Protection's TECS system.
One flight on June 11, 2019, originated from an 'INS' (Immigration and Naturalization Service) location, suggesting potential interaction with immigration authorities.
The document is a law enforcement sensitive record generated by CBP, indicating official monitoring of Epstein's movements.
